p: Out of 531 people who have participated in the survey, 26.6% of people were tested for COVID‚Äê19 in which 7.8% of people were found positive as shown in Figure 2a. In the survey, we found that people are boosting their immunity in various ways apart from using sanitizers and wearing masks. Most people (93.6%) think that Indian spices and home remedies are helpful in the treatment of coronavirus or other viral infection as well as boosting immunity.
